const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    aggs: {
      genres: {
        terms: {
          field: 'genre',
          order: {
            'playback_stats.max': 'desc'
          }
        },
        aggs: {
          playback_stats: {
            stats: {
              field: 'play_count'
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
